targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime_format") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used", mean(free) as "free" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT last("total") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT last("usage_iowait") FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device"

list.label: interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/
